page.title: 13FENTON PARK AND CEMETERY
page.content: In 1916 Fenton Park was created.At the entrance there are green gates and a welcome sign.It is a nice environment there is not a lot of noise,only a few sounds of traffic.You see and hear a lot of birds.There is a rockery with limestone boulders set into the ground and it has a lovely spread of flowers coloured purple,white,yellow,orange, green,blue,red and maroon. There is a drinking fountain in the park,which was brought from Fountain Square in Fenton and was a bequest to the people,from one"William Baker Esq". Fenton Cemetery built in 1887,was one of the last ones to be made in the city.The two chapels in the grounds are being restored at present.There is a Moslem section in the cemetery and their gravestones face in an Easterly direction towards the holy city of Mecca.The cemetery is a peaceful place.
